Performer:
Takemoto Koshijidayū IV (竹本越路大夫 (四))

Dates: '1967/01-'

Specialty: Tayu

Notes: [Living National Treasure]; Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


– Click image to view.
